text: Since I began the journey of programming as a hobby nearly 3 years ago, I have quickly developed that hobby into client work that ranges in difficulties, from consulting someone's startup idea to collaborating with people to complete a project/product.

I create full-stack applications that can securely and quickly communicate with websites reliably, while guaranteeing a responsive layout for the user's to access. The main area of my expertise is back-end development, Node JS, creating projects that scale to demand to developing custom frameworks that guarantee user friendly code to ensure readability.
Regardless of that, this doesn't stop me from building small to medium websites or applications, using frameworks such as Vue or Electron.
